message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IT

This paper deals with video representation and classification, which are core topics in computer vision. The proposed method involves sparse coding and dictionary learning, which are common techniques in computer vision and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves learning a linear transition matrix between frames, which is a topic in machine learning and signal processing, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.IT (Information Theory) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also mentions the use of the proposed method for DT synthesis and recognition, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
